Package uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.connections.model

Interface MessageReceiver<MessageType>

Type Parameters:
MessageType - The type of message to be received. It's possible for the received information to even be metadata about the message, and not the content of the message.
All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.AutoCloseable, SocketHolder
All Known Subinterfaces:
BootReceiver, EIEIOReceiver, Listenable<MessageType>, SDPReceiver
All Known Implementing Classes:
BMPConnection, BootConnection, DelegatingSCPConnection, EIEIOConnection, IPAddressConnection, SCPConnection, SDPConnection, UDPConnection
public interface MessageReceiver<MessageType>
extends SocketHolder
A receiver of SpiNNaker messages.
Author:
Donal Fellows

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default MessageType receiveMessage()
    Receives a SpiNNaker message from this connection.
    MessageType receiveMessage​(java.lang.Integer timeout)
    Receives a SpiNNaker message from this connection.

    Methods inherited from interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

    close

    Methods inherited from interface uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.connections.model.SocketHolder

    getLocalIPAddress, getLocalPort, getRemoteIPAddress, getRemotePort

  • Method Details

    • receiveMessage

      default MessageType receiveMessage() throws java.io.IOException
      Receives a SpiNNaker message from this connection. Blocks until a message has been received.
      Returns:
      the received message
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If there is an error receiving the message
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If one of the fields of the SpiNNaker message is invalid

    • receiveMessage

      MessageType receiveMessage​(java.lang.Integer timeout) throws java.io.IOException
      Receives a SpiNNaker message from this connection. Blocks until a message has been received, or a timeout occurs.
      Parameters:
      timeout - The time in seconds to wait for the message to arrive; if null, will wait forever, or until the connection is closed.
      Returns:
      the received message
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If there is an error receiving the message
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If one of the fields of the SpiNNaker message is invalid
